trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.DesignerActionUIStateChange"></xref> event of a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta il metodo che gestirà il <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.DesignerActionUIStateChange"> </xref> evento di un <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The event model in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] is based on having an event delegate that connects an event with its handler.
trans-unit.target: Il modello degli eventi di [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] si basa su un delegato dell'evento che si connette a un evento con il relativo gestore.

trans-unit.source: To raise a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.DesignerActionUIStateChange> event, two elements are needed: - The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeEventArgs> class, derived from <xref:System.EventArgs?displayProperty=fullName>, which holds the event data.
trans-unit.target: Per generare un <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.DesignerActionUIStateChange>evento, sono necessari due elementi: - il <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeEventArgs>classe, derivata da <xref:System.EventArgs?displayProperty=fullName>, che contiene i dati dell'evento.</xref:System.EventArgs?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeEventArgs> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.DesignerActionUIStateChange>

trans-unit.source: - The DesignerActionUIStateChangeEventHandler delegate, which points to a method that provides the response to the event.
trans-unit.target: -DesignerActionUIStateChangeEventHandler delegato, che fa riferimento a un metodo che fornisce la risposta all'evento.

trans-unit.source: When you create a DesignerActionUIStateChangeEventHandler delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: Quando si crea un delegato DesignerActionUIStateChangeEventHandler, si identifica il metodo che gestirà l'evento.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Per associare l'evento al gestore eventi, aggiungere un'istanza del delegato all'evento.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: Il gestore eventi viene chiamato ogni volta che si verifica l'evento, a meno che non venga rimosso il delegato.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sui delegati del gestore eventi, vedere [NIB: eventi e delegati](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
